title: Client bugsplats and reopens over and over again plz help!!!! :(
body: As I logged onto my PC this morning, after playing LoL last night, I opened my client, only to be bombarded with constant bugsplats. The game would then Reopen, and bugsplat again at the same moment in launch. I tried a fresh reinstall, along with a repair, I've updated my graphics card drivers, virtually everything I could do, yet I still cannot open the client without a bugsplat. It crashes before the login screen even loads, and the bugsplat reports keep piling on. Please help me, and thank you. :)

replies.body: Start league of legends with the "Run as Administrator" option.
I'm having the same issue. The only way I can stop it from reopening is by ending the task via the task manager before it crashes. Discord overlay is disabled for me, and I've never had it enabled.
This is likely being caused by Discord Overlay.  Disabling that should do the trick!
